messages.subject: Interesting New Book + hino-shinsengumi.com
messages.msgSnippet: I didn t post this at shinsengumimb.com or shinsengumidb.com because I do not have the isbn # for this *INTERESTING* book. From http://www.hino-shinsengumi.com
messages.messageBody:
I didn't post this at shinsengumimb.com or shinsengumidb.com because I
do not have the isbn # for this *INTERESTING* book.

From http://www.hino-shinsengumi.com (http://8614.teacup.com/hijikata/bbs)
Contribution day: 22:25 53 seconds on Thurs., October 14

図解雑学　剣豪列伝」
- "Illustration knowledge-of-miscellaneous-matters great-swordsman 列伝"
（加来　耕三・監修、岸　祐二・著、ナツメ社）￥１４７０
(Kaku Kozo and editorial supervision, shore Yuji and work, and
NATSUME) \1470
・・・新選組からは近藤・土方・沖田・永倉・斎藤が取上げられています。
... Kondo, Hijikata, Okita, Nagakura, and Saito are taken up from the
new compilation group.

(very often the martial arts dimension of the Shinsengumi is
overlooked so I am thrilled that such a work is now available).

Tama gave me the webpage for registering for hino-shinsengumi.com's
membership/newsletter however the form required an address in Japan.
At first I thought the newsletter was via email. From what I can tell
the newsletter seems free. If INDEED the newsletter is *free* of
charge I would like to recommend anyone who is living or WILL live in
Japan for a time to try subscribing. Also I did email Shimada Kai at
hino-shinsengumi but got no reply (basically I just wanted to make
friends with these wonderful and enthusiastic people).
